## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

read track data

```{r}
track=read_table2("men_track_field.txt")
track
```

```{r}
track_num = track %>% select_if(is.numeric)
track_num
```

```{r}
track.pc = track_num %>% princomp(cor=T)
summary(track.pc)
```

```{r}
names(track.pc)
```

```{r}
track.pc$loadings %>% str()
```
